SELECT
    CONCAT('{"uid":', uid, ', "investment_id":', unique_user_id, ', "amount":', (wallet - locked_amount), '},') AS json_output
FROM
    cent_virtual_account
WHERE
    unique_user_id IN (1000171993,1000183045,1000205386,1000216494,1000068387,1000121970,1000281874,1000212046,1000211117,1000210623,1000086890,1000163959,1000140037,1000169885,1000233610,1000175996,1000310585,1000191673,1000293564,1000181240,1000169195,1000149661,1000148155,1000316273,1000316283)
    AND (wallet - locked_amount) > 0;
